io.orchestrate.client
Class Client

java.lang.Object
  io.orchestrate.client.Client

public final class Client
extends java.lang.Object

A client used to read and write data to the Orchestrate.io service.

Usage: 

 Client client = Client.builder("your api key").build();

 // OR (as a shorthand with default settings):
 Client client = new Client("your api key");

          Builder used to create Client instances.

public static final io.orchestrate.client.Client.API V0
Initial API; has KV, Events, Search, and early Graph support.

Constructor Detail

Client

public Client(java.lang.String apiKey)
Create a new client with the specified apiKey and default JacksonMapper.

Equivalent to: 

 Client client = Client.builder("your api key").build();

Parameters:
apiKey - An API key for the Orchestrate.io service.

              com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
Create a new client with the specified apiKey and objectMapper.

Parameters:
apiKey - An API key for the Orchestrate.io service.
objectMapper - The Jackson JSON mapper to marshall data with.

stop

public void stop()
          throws java.io.IOException
Stops the thread pool and closes all connections in use by all the operations.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - If resources couldn't be stopped.

builder

public static Client.Builder builder(java.lang.String apiKey)
A new builder to create a Client with default settings.

Returns:
